label: chargeableWeightMeasure
comment: A measure of a chargeable weight of this supply chain consignment.
A measure of the supply chain consignment item weight on which charges are to be based.
The measure of the chargeable weight, at line level, for this trade delivery.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
An item within a consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
